ivardefs.name: outcome
ivardefs.desc: One of the potential outcomes for the patient (e.g. remission, death,  a particular condition).

ivardefs.name: qualitativeRisk
ivardefs.desc: How likely is the outcome (in the specified timeframe), expressed as a qualitative value (e.g. low, medium, high).

ivardefs.name: rationale
ivardefs.desc: Additional information explaining the basis for the prediction.

ivardefs.name: relativeRisk
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the risk for this particular subject (with their specific characteristics) divided by the risk of the population in general.  (Numbers greater than 1 = higher risk than the population, numbers less than 1 = lower risk.).

properties.desc: Describes the expected outcome for the subject.
